Notes.Text:
This update for salt fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2022-22967: Fixed missing check for PAM_ACCT_MGM return value that could be used to bypass authentication when using PAM (bsc#1200566)
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: An issue was discovered in SaltStack Salt in versions before 3002.9, 3003.5, 3004.2. PAM auth fails to reject locked accounts, which allows a previously authorized user whose account is locked still run Salt commands when their account is locked. This affects both local shell accounts with an active session and salt-api users that authenticate via PAM eauth.
